page.title: 01MORETON ENVIRONS
page.content: When we first looked at our area on the map we thought we wouldn't have much to write about.It seemed there was so much flat farmland. We were disappointed that some parts of Moreton were not in our area.Then we started to investigate the area and found out that a lot goes on,in and around our village. Most of us enjoy living in the country and would rather be here than in a town. Moreton has several special days.There is a Rose Queen Festival in June,Village Day in July,and St.Martin's Day in November.During the winter the Essex Hunt meets in Moreton. We have just heard that Moreton has won the Best Kept Small Village In Essex Competition for the sixth time.
